entries.journal_entry_description: At the end of the Chenataa River lies an abandoned Imperial camp. An Outcast informant has hidden 6 boxes of weapons and supplies for the Society to gather and use against the Kerritamba. As per Aveso Ars, you need to gather the boxes and bring them back.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Find the Imperial Camp and collect 6 Supply Boxes for Aveso Ars.
